Articles.Content: Early access to SW:tOR has started, but there\'s a new experimental release of KSP! Which do I play???

it\'s either Star Wars: The Kerbpublic or Kerbal Wars Space Program

KSP or KSP you don\'t have a choice 8)
Which ever one you get play it in the style of the other! ;P

Which ever one you get play it in the style of the other! ;P

So now I\'ll have to try getting Kerbin\'s terrain to glitch into trenches so I can fly a tri-wing craft made with C7 parts and hunt for Womp Rats.

Wow. I think I\'ve only launched like, three rockets since I got SWtOR. It\'s that good.

I mean yes, it\'s just SW-flavored WoW, but IT\'S SW-FLAVORED!

And the voice-acting, which I thought was just a cheesy ploy to be different, really is different. It engages you in the storyline so every little side quest matters. This thing totally rocks.

I know the shiny will wear off in a few weeks, though, and I\'ll be back here.
